Text:
------------
Installation
------------

 - Download the PC version of Beats of Rage from the following location:

http://www.senileteam.com/downloads.php?d=6

 - Upload the BOR.PAK file to a directory on your XBox

 - Upload the DEFAULT.XBE file to the same directory on your XBox

 - Run the DEFAULT.XBE file

 - You can also upload any compatible OpenBOR PAK file into the same directory and you can choose
   which one to load.  One of the files should be named BOR.PAK
